name: Chaos Resolver
description:
You should sort fruits to create jam. 

It was my jam entry for the 6th Brtackeys Game Jam. The idea was given by my son (3yo) who dumped 3 kind of toys to the same pile.

Use mouse to drag the correct fruit to the correct crate. You have 1 minute. At the end you get your results. 

The model (fruits, crate and the conveyor belt texture) was used from the Synty Studio POLYGON Farm pack.
